      public void drawExponential​(Graphics g, double c, double slope, int daysSpace, int h, int w, int marg, int max)
      DrawsExponential function
      Parameters:
      g - graphics interface
      c - c*e^(m*x)
      slope - c*e^(m*x)
      daysSpace - space between days
      h - height of canvas
      w - width of canvas
      marg - margin of canvas
      max - biggest value

    • drawing

      public void drawing​(Graphics g, int w, int h, int days, int[] values, double slope, double Yintercept, Date startDate, Boolean dark, List<String> nev, int margin, boolean egy, boolean ketto, boolean harom, int runningDayCount)
      Draws everything on the graphics panel
      Parameters:
      g - graphics interface
      w - width of canvas
      h - height of canvas
      days - days number
      values - measured values
      slope - slope of linear line
      Yintercept - y intercept of linear line
      startDate - starting date
      dark - dark mode is enabled or not
      nev - daily cases
      margin - margin
      egy - Boolean decides if the graph will be drawn or not
      ketto - Boolean decides if the graph will be drawn or not
      harom - Boolean decides if the graph will be drawn or not
      runningDayCount - the number of how many days we are calculating the running average with

      w - width
      Yintercept - intercept of Y axis

      dark - dark mode

    • dayDraw

      private void dayDraw​(Graphics2D g2D, Boolean dark, int marg, int h, int days, double daysSpace, int[] values, int osztas, String igaziNagyonFincsiMincsiSuperFaszaDate, int gombatmero, double Yskala, List<String> nev)

      Parameters:
      g2D - g2Dgraphics interface
      dark - dark mode
      marg - marg margin
      h - height
      days - number of days
      daysSpace - space between days
      values - measured values of days
      osztas - y axis divided into this number
      igaziNagyonFincsiMincsiSuperFaszaDate - string that writes out the date format
      gombatmero - diameter of globe
      Yskala - scale of Y axis
      nev - daily cases
